ActionInstalled.description: Returns the actions configured within a TrueSight Pulse account

ActionTypes.description: List action types associated with the TrueSight Pulse account

AlarmCreate.description: Creates an alarm definition in an TrueSight Pulse account

AlarmDelete.description: Deletes an alarm definition from a TrueSight Pulse account

AlarmGet.description: Retrieves an alarm definition from a TrueSight Pulse account

AlarmList.description: List alarm definitions associated with the TrueSight Pulse account

AlarmSearch.description: Searches for an alarm definition by name from a TrueSight Pulse account

AlarmUpdate.description: Updates an alarm definition in an TrueSight Pulse account

EventCreate.description: Creates a new event in an TrueSight Pulse account

EventList.description: Lists the events in a TrueSight Pulse account

HostgroupCreate.description: Creates host group definition in a TrueSight Pulse account

HostgroupDelete.description: Deletes a host group definition by id from a TrueSight Pulse account

HostgroupGet.description: Retrieves a single host group definition by id from a TrueSight Pulse account

HostgroupList.description: Lists the Host Groups in an TrueSight Pulse account

HostgroupSearch.description: Searches for Host Group by name in an TrueSight Pulse account

HostgroupUpdate.description: Updates host group definition in a TrueSight Pulse account

MeasurementCreate.description: Adds a measurement value to a TrueSight Pulse account

MeterClient.description: Communicates with an TrueSight Pulse meter using JSON RPC

MeasurementGet.description: Retrieves measurement values from a metric in a TrueSight Pulse account

MetricCreate.description: Creates a new metric definition in an TrueSight Pulse account

MetricCreateBatch.description: Creates multiple metric definitions from a file into a TrueSight Pulse account

MetricDelete.description: Deletes a metric definition from a TrueSight Pulse account

MetricExport.description: Export the metric definitions from a TrueSight Pulse account

MetricGet.description: Get a metric definition from a TrueSight Pulse account

MetricList.description: Lists the defined metrics in a TrueSight Pulse account

MetricUpdate.description: Updates a metric definition in an TrueSight Pulse account

PluginAdd.description: Imports a meter plugin from a GitHub repository into a TrueSight Pulse account

PluginGet.description: Get the details of a plugin in a TrueSight Pulse account

PluginGetComponents.description: Get the components of a plugin in a TrueSight Pulse account

PluginInstall.description: Installs a plugin into a TrueSight Pulse account

PluginInstalled.description: Gets the plugins installed into a TrueSight Pulse account

PluginList.description: Lists the plugins in a TrueSight Pulse account

PluginReadme.description: Generates README from plugin.json and template

PluginRemove.description: Remove a staged pre-release meter plugin from a TrueSight Pulse account

PluginUninstall.description: Uninstalls a plugin from a TrueSight Pulse account

RelayGetConfig.description: Returns relay configuration from a TrueSight Pulse account

RelayList.description: Lists the relays in a TrueSight Pulse account

RelaySetConfig.description: Sets the configuration of a relay in a TrueSight Pulse account

SourceDelete.description: Delete sources from a TrueSight Pulse account

SourceList.description: Lists the sources in a TrueSight Pulse account

UserGet.description: Returns the user associated with the TrueSight Pulse account
